items.content_html: Socket.ge: A lightweight Node.js library for real-time socket connections. Simplify server-side socket handling, client management, and event communication. Ideal for chat apps, games, and collaborative tools. Get started with npm install socket.ge. #NodeJS #RealTime #WebSocket
items.title: ZaalTsagareli/socket.ge: Socket.ge: A lightweight Node.js library for real-time socket connections. Simplify server-side socket handling, client management, and event communication. Ideal for chat apps, games, and collaborative tools. Get started with npm install socket.ge. #NodeJS #RealTime #WebSocket

items.content_html: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions. While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it, such as Node.js, Apache CouchDB and Adobe Acrobat.
